transcript: she had quit her job to join me do this thing six months later I'm like I don't know if I can do this I'm so overwhelmed I've got nine businesses none of them are making money some of you stole from me I had all the stuff that's going wrong I just had a DUI my mother's in the hospital I'm just like I have nothing left and so she was like well I'm gonna go do the launch that we're supposed to do and then she broke every record she still has the all-time record for the biggest launch and it was like she stood tall when was tough and I think that's where I was like well wherever I want to go I'm gonna need someone like that
